en.abouttext1: I work as a front-end developer focused on building clean, modern, and responsive user interfaces using React and the latest web technologies. I enjoy turning ideas and designs into smooth, interactive experiences while writing maintainable and scalable code.
en.abouttext2: I learn new tools quickly and approach technical challenges with logical problem-solving. I perform well under pressure, manage my time effectively, and collaborate easily with teams. I value clarity, structured thinking, and continuous improvement.
en.abouttext3: My goal is to join a professional team where I can contribute to creating strong digital products with great user experience. I am committed to improving my skills, expanding my knowledge of the front-end ecosystem, and building interfaces that deliver real value to users.
en.skillsjs.desc: My main language for building dynamic and interactive user interfaces
en.skillstsdesc: A typed version of JavaScript that I'm currently learning to improve code maintainability
en.skillshtmldesc: Markup language I use to structure web pages
en.skillscssdesc: Styling language I use to design responsive and modern UI layouts
en.projectsproject1desc: A fully responsive e-commerce interface built with React, custom hooks, and API integration.
en.projectsproject2desc: A productivity front-end app built with React, handling tasks, filters, and smooth animations.
en.projectsproject3desc: A modern portfolio showcasing my front-end skills using React, CSS, and animations.
